19 typedef std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d>::const_iterator AffineMapConstIterator;

21 HeadHandUpdater::HeadHandUpdater()
22 {
23  _tf_br = new tf::TransformBroadcaster();
24 }

26 HeadHandUpdater::~HeadHandUpdater()
27 {
28  delete _tf_br;

31 bool HeadHandUpdater::update(Robot *h, const Eigen::Affine3d &base, const std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d> &joints, const HumanSettings &settings)
32 {
33  RobotState q(h);
34  bool ok=computeConf(h,base,joints,settings,q);
35  h->setAndUpdate(q);
36  return ok;
37 }
38 
39 bool HeadHandUpdater::computeConf(Robot *h, const Eigen::Affine3d &base, const std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d> &joints, const HumanSettings &settings, RobotState &q)
40 {
41  using namespace Eigen;
42  bool ok=true;
43  q = *h->getCurrentPos();
44  std::string torsojoint_name("base_torso"), headjoint_name("torso_head"), handjoint_name("right_hand_joint");
45  std::string input_head_name("head"),input_torso_name("torso"),input_hand_name("rightHand");
46 
47  //base
48  ok=updateFreeFlyer(q,6,base);
49 
50  //tf for debug
51  tf::Transform tr;
52  tr.setFromOpenGLMatrix(base.data());
53  _tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr,ros::Time::now(),"move3d_origin","/move3d_dbg/base"));
54  for (typeof(joints.begin()) it=joints.begin();it!=joints.end();it++){
55  tf::Transform tr;
56  tr.setFromOpenGLMatrix(it->second.data());
57  _tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr,ros::Time::now(),"move3d_origin","/move3d_dbg/"+it->first));
58  }
59 
60 
61  //joints
62 
63  uint jnt_id;
64  AffineMapConstIterator affine_it;
65  Affine3d rel_pos_torso, abs_pos_head,abs_pos_torso;
66  if(ok){
67  //torso
68  //torso follows base
69  //torso origin is the same as the head without the x and y rotations
70  if(getBothJoints(h,joints,input_head_name,torsojoint_name,affine_it,jnt_id)){
71  Joint *joint=h->getJoint(jnt_id);
72  assert(joint->getName() == torsojoint_name);
73  abs_pos_head=affine_it->second;
74  abs_pos_torso=affine_it->second;
75  Eigen::Vector3d all_rot = abs_pos_torso.rotation().eulerAngles(0,1,2);
76  abs_pos_torso =Eigen::AngleAxisd(all_rot[2],Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
77  abs_pos_torso.pretranslate(affine_it->second.translation());
78 
79  rel_pos_torso = m3dGeometry::changeFrame(abs_pos_torso,m3dGeometry::absoluteFramePos(),base);
80  updateFreeFlyer(q,joint->getIndexOfFirstDof(),rel_pos_torso);
81  tf::Transform tr;
82  tr.setFromOpenGLMatrix(rel_pos_torso.data());
83  _tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr,ros::Time::now(),"/move3d_dbg/base","/move3d_dbg/"+joint->getName()));
84  //reset Rx and Ry
85  q[joint->getIndexOfFirstDof()+3]=0;
86  q[joint->getIndexOfFirstDof()+4]=0;
87  }else{
88  ok=false;
89  }
90  }
91 
92  if(ok){
93  //head
94  //follows torso
95  if(getBothJoints(h,joints,input_head_name,headjoint_name,affine_it,jnt_id)){
96  Joint *joint=h->getJoint(jnt_id);
97  assert(joint->getName() == headjoint_name);
98  Affine3d rel_pos_head = m3dGeometry::changeFrame(affine_it->second,m3dGeometry::absoluteFramePos(),abs_pos_torso);
99  updateFreeFlyer(q,joint->getIndexOfFirstDof(),rel_pos_head);
100  tf::Transform tr;
101  tr.setFromOpenGLMatrix(rel_pos_head.data());
102  _tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr,ros::Time::now(),"/move3d_dbg/"+torsojoint_name,"/move3d_dbg/"+joint->getName()));
103  assert(rel_pos_head.translation().norm() <0.00001);
104  }else{
105  ok=false;
106  }
107  }
108 
109  if(ok){
110  //hand
111  //follows base
112  if(getBothJoints(h,joints,input_hand_name,handjoint_name,affine_it,jnt_id)){
113  Joint *joint=h->getJoint(jnt_id);
114  assert(joint->getName() == handjoint_name);
115  Affine3d rel_pos_hand = m3dGeometry::changeFrame(affine_it->second,m3dGeometry::absoluteFramePos(),base);
116  updateFreeFlyer(q,joint->getIndexOfFirstDof(),rel_pos_hand);
117  }else{
118  ok=false;
119  }
120  }
121  return ok;
122 }
123 
124 bool HeadHandUpdater::getBothJoints(Robot *h, const std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d> &joints,
125  const std::string &input_name, const std::string &m3d_name,
126  AffineMapConstIterator &joint, uint &m3d_joint_index)
127 {
128  bool ok(true);
129  AffineMapConstIterator it=joints.find(input_name);
130  if(it==joints.end()){
131  ok=false;
132  ROS_WARN("Human model %s is updated without specifying its %s joint position",h->getName().c_str(),input_name.c_str());
133  }
134  Joint *jnt;
135  if(ok){
136  jnt=h->getJoint(m3d_name);
137  if(!jnt){
138  ok=false;
139  ROS_WARN("Human model %s has no joint named %s in move3d",h->getName().c_str(),m3d_name.c_str());
140  }
141  }
142  if(ok){
143  joint = it;
144  m3d_joint_index = jnt->getId();
145  }
146  return ok;
147 }
148 
149 bool HeadHandUpdater::updateFreeFlyer(RobotState &q, uint first_dof_index, const Eigen::Affine3d &pos)
150 {
151  for(uint i=0;i<3;i++){
152  q[i+first_dof_index]=pos.translation()[i];
153  }
154  Eigen::Vector3d rotations = pos.rotation().eulerAngles(0,1,2);
155  for(uint i=0;i<3;i++){
156  q[i+3+first_dof_index]=rotations[i];
157  }
158  // tf::Transform tr;
159  // tf::Quaternion tfq(rotations[0],rotations[1],rotations[2]);
160  // tr.setRotation(tfq);
161  // tr.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(pos.translation()[0],pos.translation()[1],pos.translation()[2]));
162  // uint dummy;
163  // tf_br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr,ros::Time::now(),"move3d_origin","/move3d_dbg/"+q.getRobot()->getJointAt(first_dof_index,dummy)->getName()));
164 }
